script:module:
function SetStyle(style as string) rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem define variables dim document as object dim dispatcher as object rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem get access to the document document = ThisComponent.CurrentController.Frame dispatcher = createUnoService("com.sun.star.frame.DispatchHelper")
rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- dim args1(1) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args1(0).Name = "Template" args1(0).Value = style args1(1).Name = "Family" args1(1).Value = 2
dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:StyleApply", "", 0, args1())
args1(1).Value = 1
dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:StyleApply", "", 0, args1())
end function
Sub p() SetStyle("p" ) end Sub
